channel.title: Google on Ram's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Google on Ram's Website

item.title: Google Bard: A Large Language Model Chatbot
item.author: bhaskarvilles@duck.com (Bhaskar)
item.description: What is Google Bard? Google Bard is a large language model (LLM) chatbot developed by Google AI. It is trained on a massive dataset of text and code, and can generate text, translate languages, write different kinds of creative content, and answer your questions in an informative way. Bard is still under development, but it has learned to perform many kinds of tasks, including I will try my best to follow your instructions and complete your requests thoughtfully.

item.title: Google wants to become a key infrastructure provider for Web3
item.author: bhaskarvilles@duck.com (Bhaskar)
item.description: Google Launches Cloud Node Engine For Ethereum Developers Google is launching a cloud-based node engine service for Ethereum developers and projects, the tech company announced Thursday. Officially called Blockchain Node Engine, Google’s offering is a “fully managed service,” meaning customers won’t have to hire their own teams to maintain or monitor their nodes. Instead, Google says it “actively monitors the nodes and restarts them if anything goes wrong.” The Blockchain Node Engine also includes various security features like Google’s Cloud Armor, which is designed to prevent denial-of-service (DDos) attacks that spam and slow down networks.

item.author: bhaskarvilles@duck.com (Bhaskar)
